15 #include <LSLfilter.hpp>
16 
17 
18 namespace tsa {
19 
20  LSLfilter::LSLfilter(LSLLearning& LSL, double lambda, unsigned int size, bool Norm)
21  :
22  mBuffer(1),
23  mWinSize(size),
24  mOrder(LSL.GetOrder() + 1),
25  mLambda(lambda),
26  mSigma(size),
27  mNorm(Norm),
28  mSigma0(LSL.GetSigma()),
29  mFirstCall(true) {
30  mEF.resize(2, mOrder);
31  mEB.resize(2, mOrder);
32  mEpf.resize(2, mOrder);
33  mEpb.resize(2, mOrder);
34  mKf.resize(mOrder);
35  mKb.resize(mOrder);
36  mG.resize(mOrder);
37  mF0 = LSL.GetStatus();
38 
39  for (unsigned int k = 0; k < mOrder; k++) {
40  mEB(mF0, k) = LSL.GetErrorBackward(mF0, k);
41  mKf(k) = LSL.GetParcorForward(k);
42  mKb(k) = LSL.GetParcorBackward(k);
43  mG(k) = LSL.GetGamma(k);
44  mEpf(mF0, k) = LSL.GetEpf(mF0, k);
45  mEpb(mF0, k) = LSL.GetEpb(mF0, k);
46  }
47  }
48 
49  LSLfilter::~LSLfilter() {
50  }
51 
52  void LSLfilter::SetData(Dmatrix& Data, double scale) {
53  mBuffer.AddPoints(Data, scale);
54  }
56 
57  int LSLfilter::GetDataNeeded() {
58  return mBuffer.Size() - mWinSize;
59  }
60 
62 
63  void LSLfilter::GetData(Dmatrix& OutputData) {
64 
65  unsigned int f_0 = mF0;
66  unsigned int f_1 = 1 - mF0;
67 
68  /*--Recursive relation-----------------------------------------------*/
69 
70  unsigned int End = mOrder - 1;
71  unsigned int End2 = End - 1;
72 
73  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < mWinSize; l++) {
74  mEB(f_1, 0) = mBuffer(0, l);
75  mEF(f_1, 0) = mBuffer(0, l);
76  mEpf(f_1, 0) = mLambda * mEpf(f_0, 0) + mBuffer(0, l) * mBuffer(0, l);
77  mEpb(f_1, 0) = mLambda * mEpf(f_0, 0) + mBuffer(0, l) * mBuffer(0, l);
78  mG(0) = 1.0;
79 
80  /*--------*/
81  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mOrder; k++) {
82  unsigned int t = k - 1;
83  mEpf(f_1, t) = mLambda * mEpf(f_0, t) + mG(t) * mEF(f_1, t) * mEF(f_1, t);
84  mEpb(f_1, t) = mLambda * mEpb(f_0, t) + mG(t) * mEB(f_0, t) * mEB(f_0, t);
85  mEF(f_1, k) = mEF(f_1, t) + mKf(k) * mEB(f_0, t);
86  mEB(f_1, k) = mEB(f_0, t) + mKb(k) * mEF(f_1, t);
87  mKf(k) = mKf(k) - mG(t) * mEB(f_0, t) * mEF(f_1, k) / mEpb(f_1, t);
88  mKb(k) = mKb(k) - mG(t) * mEF(f_1, t) * mEB(f_1, k) / mEpf(f_1, t);
89  mG(k) = mG(t) - (mG(t) * mG(t)) * (mEB(f_0, t) * mEB(f_0, t)) / mEpb(f_1, t);
90 
91  }
92  OutputData(0, l) = mEF(f_1, End);
93  mSigma(l) = sqrt(mEpf(f_1, End2));
94  f_1 = 1 - f_1;
95  f_0 = 1 - f_0;
96  }
97 
98  // --- Normalization
99  /* if(mNorm) {
100  double mean=0.0;
101  for(unsigned int l = 0; l < mWinSize; l++)
102  mean+=OutputData(0,l);
103 
104  mean=mean/mWinSize;
105  for(unsigned int l = 0; l < mWinSize; l++) {
106  OutputData(0,l)= (OutputData(0,l)-mean)/mSigma(l);
107 
108  }
109  } */
110  if (mNorm) {
111  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < mWinSize; l++)
112  OutputData(0, l) /= (mSigma(l) / (1.0 / (1.0 - mLambda)));
113  }
114  mF0 = f_0;
115  mBuffer.DelPoints(mWinSize);
116  }
117 
118 }
